title: 3 Accounts perma banned for no reason
body: I. am. so. confused. 0 warnings/chat restrictions/suspensions before. Riot pls.

replies.body: After looking into this one account, it looks like someone might have been in the process of trying to steal this account from its original creator. Your best bet would be to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking "I need help recovering my account" and once they verify you then you'll be back on the Rift soon.
